item.title: Research
item.description: Active projects TB contact investigation in Peru As part of my doctoral thesis, I’m developing tools that could inform tuberculosis contact investigation and preventive therapy for pulmonary TB patients and their contacts in Lima, Peru with Prof. Megan Murray. Some preliminary results were presented on the 16th Annual Jonathan Freeman Symposium on Infectious Disease Epidemiology on Apr 27, 2018, and the 49th Union World Conference on Lung Health.
